modName: NoMaaM Walk BBBB - Breast and Butt Bounce
summary: This mod adds BBBB (Better Breast and Butt Bounce) to the female standard walk.
descriptionHtml:
[color=\"CDCCAA\"]\"WHERE THE BREASTS MAY BE FAKE, BUT MAN DO THEY SHAKE ...\".[/color] (Al Bundy, Nov 14, 1993)
[color=\"CDCCAA\"]\"WHERE YOU SEE THEIR BUTT, AND THEIR TRAPS STAY SHUT ...\".[/color] (Al Bundy, Feb 9, 1992)
___________________________________________________________________________________


[color=LightBlue][size=4]NoMaaM with Butt Bounce  --  See the VIDEO ![/size][/color]
Sorry, but YouTube deleted my video (because of a Toon\'s naked butt!), and Nexus doesn\'t accept DailyMotion videos. So here is the link:
[media][color=Blue]http://www.dailymotion.com/video/xp6omg[/color][/media]

[size=3][color=yellow]Update 2012-02-12: [/color][/size]
[color=orange]Uploaded 3 more optional animation files. Choose between one of these:[list]
[*](Main file) Original file, with muscle flex effect
[*](Option 1) Same as original file, but without muscle flex effect
[*](Option 2) Butt animation with inverse orientation (butt move to outside on weighted leg), with muscle flex effect
[*](Option 3) Butt animation with inverse orientation (butt move to outside on weighted leg), but WITHOUT muscle flex effect
[/list][/color]


[size=4]This mod adds [color=\"CDCCAA\"]BBBB (Better Bouncing Breasts and Butt)[/color] to the female standard walk (mt_walkforward.hkx).[/size]

And since there are no outfits (I know of) which are butt bounce enabled, I have also added a (nude) \"2nd Skin outfit\". This outfit is based on a body mesh from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-[/url], butt and breast weighted by CherryHotaling\'s [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4888]CHSBHC - BBP - Nude and Jiggly Mod[/url], Version 2.0.  
Although Cherry has withdrawn this piece as a body mesh, because it\'s causing problems with some races, it\'s still very well suited as an outfit.
 
___________________________________________________________________________________
[size=3][color=yellow]Required & Recommended Mods/Tools[/color][/size]
[list]
[*][url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4888]CHSBHC body mod and BBP -Breast and Butt Physics[/url] (install first!)
[*]CHSBHC compatible clothing/armor meshes as they are available, e.g. [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=71]Twiggys Colourful Barkeeps and CHSBHC bouncing meshes [/url]
[*]Optionally load and install \"NoMaaM 2nd Skin\" (nude outfit), to watch your femal\'s PC butt.
[*]I recommend to use this  mod together with [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=7093]NoMaaM Breathing Idles[/url], or the BBBed females\' breast will freeze in a possibly unnatural position as soon as walk stops.
[/list]

___________________________________________________________________________________
[size=3][color=yellow]SOME TECHNICAL WORDS[/color][/size]

Please spare me and appreciative users stupid comments about \"unnatural movement\" like I have seen before. First and foremost [color=\"CDCCAA\"]it is MY TASTE[/color] which I have implemented to the best of my ability. If you don\'t like it: simply go away, and let others enjoy.

But besides that the look of the animation is heavily dependant on several things I cannot influence:
[list]
[*][color=\"CDCCAA\"]Shape of your body/outfit mesh[/color].
[*][color=\"CDCCAA\"]Size of your body/outfit mesh[/color].
[*][color=\"CDCCAA\"]Characteristics of the skeleton[/color]. In Oblivion I had 2 breast bones per side I could freely move and rotate. With the CHSBHCskeleton I have only 1 breast bone per side which I can only rotate. Butt bones are a little better, but limited by biped constraints.
[*][color=\"CDCCAA\"]Weight paainting of the mesh[/color]. This defines, how much each area of the mesh is moved by specific bones in the animation. If weighting is done poorly, no animation in the world can create a \"natural\" look. I challange modelers to make intelligent weighting, adapted to shape and style of the mesh, and not simply copy/paste from one mesh to the next (e.g. add some weight to the skin reveiling outfit areas, as compared to the covered areas. Especially in armor meshes).
[/list]

___________________________________________________________________________________
[size=3][color=yellow]INSTALLATION[/color][/size]

[color=yellow]NMM Install/Uninstall[/color]
Is supported

[color=yellow]Manual Install[/color]
[list]
[*]Copy the contents of the provided folder into your Skyrim/Data folder. 
[*]If you use \"NoMaaM 2nd Skin\", copy NoMaaM_2ndSkin.esp into the Skyrim Data folder, and activate in Steam Data files. The Skin autfit will automatically placed into the players inventory. Please don\'t mind wrong inventory picture and world model. I consider this file only as a workaround, until real modelers step forward to provide better outfits with butt bounce.
[/list]

[color=yellow]Uninstall[/color]
[list]
[*]Delete Data/Meshes/actors/character/animations/female/mt_walkforward.hkx
[*]Delete Data/NoMaaM_2ndSkin.esp
[/list]

___________________________________________________________________________________
[size=3][color=yellow]History[/color][/size]

2012/02/19 V0.1 . . Initial Relase (BETA)

___________________________________________________________________________________
[size=3][color=yellow]Credits[/color][/size]

TheFigment [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1797]hkxcmd[/url]
CherryHotaling [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4888]CHSBHC body mod and BBP -Breast and Butt Physics[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-[/url]
 
___________________________________________________________________________________
[size=3][color=yellow]Licensing/Legal[/color][/size]

You are NOT ALLOWED to upload contents of this mod TO ANY OTHER SITE.

On SKYRIMNEXUS.com you can do whatever you want with this mod.
But you have to give credit to Caliente and CherryHotaling, if you use \"NoMaaM 2nd Skin\".
And you have to give credit to me, if you use any part of this mod.
I also like to be informed which mods are including my work.
author: fore
